ProjectTitle: CLINIC: Causes of listening difficulties in children
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/03/2024
Data sharing and reuse: In a DMP you can focus on sharing of the data underlying publications, you don't have to mention peer reviewed journal articles in gold or green open access. Data can be shared in a repository such as RDR openly or under restricted access, see www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
